sentences.sContent: It requires some kind of bookkeeping to keep records about transactions.
sentences.sContent_eng: It requires some kind of bookkeeping to keep records about transactions.
sentences.sCn: 它要求某些种类的簿记保存有关交易的记录。

sentences.sContent: To explain the difference briefly, the accountant sets up a bookkeeping system.
sentences.sContent_eng: To explain the difference briefly, the accountant sets up a bookkeeping system.
sentences.sCn: 为了简洁地解释差异现象，会计师建立起簿记系统。

sentences.sContent: "I hate computers and I never tried to figure out what he was doing because the bookkeeping all added up, " she said.
sentences.sContent_eng: "I hate computers and I never tried to figure out what he was doing because the bookkeeping all added up, " she said.
sentences.sCn: “我讨厌计算机，也从未想要弄清楚他在做什么，因为簿记全都是增加的。” 她说。

remMethod.val: book(书) + keeping(保持) → 把…保持成一本书的样子 → 簿记

words.tran: 簿记员；会计员；铁路的司旗员

trans.tranOther: the job or activity of recording the financial accounts of an organization
